General.Name: ZJAMP Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zjamp Group Co., Ltd. is involved in the production and sale of pesticides and fertilizers in China and internationally. It also provides auto trading services, including sale of vehicles and maintenance; and is involved in the production and sale of pharmaceuticals. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Ding  Jin
2.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. and Board Sec.
